spells.name: Dispel Magic, Greater
spells.description: Works as dispel magic, but can affect multiple targets.

spells.name: Heroism, Greater
spells.description: Gives +4 bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks; immunity to fear; temporary hp.

spells.name: Mind Fog
spells.description: Subjects in fog get -10 to Wis and Will checks.

spells.name: Mislead
spells.description: Turns you invisible and creates illusory double.

spells.name: Persistent Image
spells.description: As major image, but no concentration required.

spells.name: Seeming
spells.description: Changes appearance of one person per two levels.

spells.name: Shadow Evocation
spells.description: Mimics evocation of lower than 5th level, but only 20% real.

spells.name: Shadow Walk
spells.description: Step into shadow to travel rapidly.

spells.name: Song of Discord
spells.description: Forces targets to attack each other.

spells.name: Summon Monster V
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.
